titleStmt.title: An act for constituting a committee for the army and treasurers at war
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Streater and John Macock ...,

notesStmt.note: "Thursday, February 2, 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this act be forthwith printed and published. Thomas St. Nicholas, Clerk of the Parliament."
